description: This file defines a React component for a learning module page, displaying lesson content with navigation controls, progress updates, and error handling.

methods.name: LearningModulePage()
methods.description: React functional component that displays lesson modules, manages navigation, progress, and displaying content.

methods.name: markProgress
methods.description: Sends progress update to API and handles errors.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next lesson module and updates progress.

methods.name: prev
methods.description: Goes back to the previous lesson module.
